executable.title: Label Map from Probability Images
executable.description: Given a list of probability maps for labels, create a discrete label map where only the highest probability region is used for the labeling.
executable.contributor: University of Iowa Department of Psychiatry, http:://www.psychiatry.uiowa.edu

image.name: inputVolumes
image.description: The Input probaiblity images to be computed for lable maps
image.label: Input Image

image.name: outputLabelVolume
image.description: The Input binary image for region of interest
image.label: outputLabelVolume

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
